content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 1, Valencia 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 1, Valencia 0.
Offside, Valencia. Diego Alves tries a through ball, but Nélson Haedo Valdez is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Jonas (Valencia) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Nélson Haedo Valdez with a headed pass.
Attempt missed. Víctor Ruiz (Valencia) header from very close range is just a bit too high. Assisted by Tino Costa with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Attempt blocked. Xavi (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Adil Rami (Valencia) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Pedro (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Adil Rami (Valencia).
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergio Busquets replaces Alexis Sánchez.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Alexandre Song.
Tino Costa (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lionel Messi (Barcelona).

Foul by Adriano (Barcelona).
Roberto Soldado (Valencia) wins a free kick on the left wing.
